* Steve Bjorg <steveb@...> [2008-11-11 17:45]:
> Please forgive my misuse of Atom vs. AtomPub. My minds merges
> them into one blob. If you know of a good semantic distinction,
> please let me know so I can learn to avoid making this mistake
> in the future.

Very broadly, Atom is an XML vocabulary and AtomPub is an HTTP
specialisation based on it. Another way to put it is that Atom
is a microcontent envelope format and AtomPub is the authoring
protocol to edit that.

Regards,
-- 
Aristotle Pagaltzis // <http://plasmasturm.org/>
